name: Linter Cop Rules - Newer Versions
description: Rules are disabled for now because they are only applicable to newer versions of Business Central. They should be enabled when we drop support for older versions.

rules.justification: If Data Classification is set on the Table. Fields do not need the same classification.
If Application Area is set on the TablePage. Controls do not need the same classification.
Confirm() must be implemented through the Confirm Management codeunit from the System Application.
GlobalLanguage() must be implemented through the Translation Helper codeunit from the Base Application.
Utilize the Page Management codeunit for launching page.
Event subscriber arguments now use identifier syntax instead of string literals.
Use CompareDateTime method in Type Helper codeunit for DateTime variable comparisons.
Set Access property to Internal for Install/Upgrade codeunits. ~ From runtime 4.0. Important to enable rule ASAP.
The property Extensible should be explicitly set for public objects. ~ From runtime 4.0. Important to enable rule ASAP.
Explicitly set AllowInCustomizations for fields omitted on pages.
Missing ToolTip property on table field. ~ From runtime 13.0. We will enforce this rule when we drop support for older versions.
Use new Date/Time/DateTime methods for extracting parts.
Use the (CR)LFSeparator from the "Type Helper" codeunit.
